headline: America’s Vanishing Cattle Herd Drives 15% Price Hikes for Beef
summary: Beef costs have risen faster than most other items in the consumer price index, with the broad beef and veal category up 15% over the past year as of January.  Uncooked ground beef reached a fresh record after soaring by the most since June 2020 in government data released Friday.  The gains are a standout from the rest of the consumer grocery basket where things have broadly improved.

headline: Kraft Heinz: Looks Like Berkshire Got Its Wish (Rating Downgrade)
summary: Kraft Heinz financials remain pressured by inflation and tariffs, with 2026 guidance expecting negative organic net sales. Learn why KHC stock is downgraded to hold.
